items.sentence: My hope is that we'll be able to get that done by Monday.
I really hope Mr. Jackson is my French teacher next year.
The hope is that the results will be different this time.
We have to finish preparations for the party by tomorrow.
Did Tom say when he was going to get back from Australia?
I'm going to Australia next week with some of my friends.
I feel like talking a walk. Would you like to come along?
Which of the books that I lent you did you like the best?
If you study hard, you should be able to get good grades.
I think that everybody here knows that Tom can't do that.
